resources.string: "This is the Main activity of the app. It contains the other activity names where you can navigate from here."

"This activity shows all the songs on the actual device. In a developed version the songs will grouped by song title, artist, genre, album title and published date. A Horizontal ScrollView was used to show the options. By tapping them, a toast message pops up. Below that there are the albums in a linear layout. By tapping them, the Media Player opens."

"This activity shows the Media Store. It is opened via the app. The first line is a search field. Below that the activity (in a ScrollView) shows the album as an image, the title of the songs and the duration. It would be added by random selection. The last icon is a "basket" and directs the user to the browser or to the Google Play store"

"This activity shows the Media Player. The picture symbolizes the album cover. Below that the buttons show a toast message when the user taps them play / pause / forward / rewind / mute the song. The "basket" symbol directs the user to the Media Store activity"
